## Description

Brief description of the changes made.

## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Code refactoring
- [ ] Documentation update

## Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] Code follows the style guidelines in SKILLS.md
- [ ] Self-review of code completed
- [ ] Code is properly typed (TypeScript)
- [ ] No console.log statements (except warn/error)
- [ ] No unused imports or variables

### Testing
- [ ] Changes tested locally
- [ ] All existing tests pass (`npm test`)
- [ ] New tests added for new functionality

### Performance & Accessibility
- [ ] No dynamic Tailwind class names
- [ ] ARIA labels added for interactive elements
- [ ] Proper loading and error states implemented
- [ ] No unnecessary re-renders

### Documentation
- [ ] SKILLS.md updated if needed
- [ ] Comments added for complex logic
- [ ] JSDoc comments for public functions

Fixes #(issue number)

Any additional information or context.
